title: Interpretation of Gabriel's dream in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Gabriel in a dream: Gabriel is a sincere spirit, descending upon the prophets and messengers with a message from God and calling them, and dreaming about him is one of the most promising visions, which means a lot of goodness for the Messenger. You may also be interested in learning about the bathroom in a dream, the end of stress and suffering and the alleviation of problems. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Gabriel in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Gabriel in a dream. Seeing Gabriel in human form means a lot of good things, a lot of food and good news for the viewer. The vision also shows the girl’s marriage to a creative and religiously righteous man. The name Gabriel in a divorced woman’s dreamIf she sees a divorced woman The name Gabriel in a dream, this represents the end of delicious food, stress and suffering. The vision may also indicate that she is blessed with a good husband. Mention of the name Gabriel in a dream Seeing the name Gabriel mentioned in a dream is one of the visions that give good omens and good news and make the dreamer’s life better. It also represents the end Worries, sorrows, and the return of problems that plagued viewers. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Whoever sees Gabriel, peace be upon him. Whoever sees Gabriel, peace be upon him, and rejoices in his dreams, then speak to him with kind words, advice, testimony, and good news. This indicates that the dreamer will gain glory, honor, power and good news. If he is upset, then he has triumphed, and if he is afraid, he feels safe, and if he is taking care of them, then God will worry him, soften him and save him. Reasons for dreaming of talking to Gabriel It represents the end of his fears and anxiety. Who hears the name Gabriel In his ears it indicates that this is a good vision and is almost reassuring. It also shows the fortuneteller entering into high-ranking business and good luck. Read also: Washing the deadI dream of Gabriel in human form for a married woman. Seeing Gabriel, when he came to the married woman, she felt peace and suffered from worries and delusions. It indicates the death of those worries and sorrows and their replacement with joy and happiness. The vision also shows the dreamer’s good condition and his distance from evil, as well as salvation from the enemy and distance from the enemy. Seeing an angel in human form in a dream Seeing an angel in human form is a promising vision, indicating the dreamer’s purity and chastity. And his dedication. The vision also shows the disappearance of anxiety and almost relief when the dreamer suffers. This vision also indicates that the dreamer’s rich livelihood and religion will be placed on his shoulders. Read also: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of seeing an angel flying in the sky in a dreamSeeing an angel flying in the sky, this is one of the wonderful visions related to By getting rid of troubles and problems, and this vision applies to both men and women. And the condition of the dreamer and the justice of his sin. Seeing the angel also shows the goodness, justice, and honesty of the dreamer, and his desire to be fulfilled. In a dream when I was sick and he was talking to me, if our Lord Gabriel dreamed of seeing him in peace, This dream means that the patient is close to recovering from the disease and symbolizes that he will soon get rid of all the pain that it may cause. He suffers forever and finds a healthy, peaceful and comfortable life, and an appointment as soon as possible with the news that brings joy to his heart, God willing.

title: What is the interpretation of Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of Umrah and its importanceMuslims dream of going to the holy sites for Umrah or Hajj, and among the visions that the dreamer sees and wakes up happy is the vision of Umrah and visiting the Sacred House of God, and therefore this vision is one of the visions. Which must be interpreted carefully to know what it means. Interpretation of a dream about Umrah Al-Nabulsi confirmed that the dreamer who sees in a dream that he has gone for Umrah is evidence of his long life and the increase in livelihood that he will obtain in the near future. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he has gone for Umrah, this is evidence of his imminent death and death. An unmarried woman who dreams of traveling to perform Umrah, this indicates that she will soon marry a good man who fears God within her, and if she is uncomfortable in her life, this vision indicates that she will soon gain peace of mind and reassurance. If she is engaged, this vision confirms that her marriage will be happy. If an unmarried woman sees the Kaaba in her dream, this means that she will marry a generous man who has great authority in society. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is being watered with Zamzam water, this is evidence that God It will give her good health and a high-status husband. One of the praiseworthy visions for a single woman is seeing the Black Stone. Because it indicates the fulfillment of desires and marriage to a well-off man. As for the married woman who sees the Kaaba and goes to perform Umrah, this indicates the end of the quarrels and disagreements that have disturbed her life with her husband, and if she actually has a sick son for his merciful recovery, and if she is suffering from an illness, God will remove it from her. Pain and suffering and the disease disappears from her body. Seeing a married woman who went with her husband to perform Umrah is evidence of their good condition and the continuation of life together for many years. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream that she went for Umrah indicates that her newborn will be righteous and love God and His Messenger, even if she is newly married. She is waiting for pregnancy, so this vision tells her that she is pregnant and that the pregnancy period will be easy and without problems. Seeing a man performing Umrah is evidence of his wealth, the tranquility of his married life, and his freedom from misfortunes. The vision also confirms that his money is permissible and he always strives to please God and the Messenger. If a single person who is known to be reckless and not religious dreams of going for Umrah in his dream, the vision indicates that God will correct his situation and he will turn away from the forbidden behaviors that he carries out in his life and will take the straight path, which is the path Correct worship. Supplication during Umrah is evidence that the dreamer will find peace in his heart by obtaining what he wants and everything he said will be fulfilled while standing in front of the House of God. If the single person is looking for his life partner in reality and dreams of performing Umrah, then this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions in which God promised him that He marries a religious girl and treats her well, as is said in the Islamic religion. If the dreamer performs the prayer during Umrah, and in front of the Sacred House of God, then this is evidence of the strong connection that connects him to God Almighty. What is the interpretation of the dream of going for Umrah by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Shirin confirmed that seeing Umrah in a dream is evidence of salvation.

If the dreamer performs the prayer during Umrah, and in front of the Sacred House of God, this is evidence of the strong connection that connects him to God Almighty. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of going to Umrah? Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing Umrah in a dream is evidence of success

title: Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream or a dream through the website Roy2a.com, the lawyer is the person entrusted with defending rights holders or the accused according to the laws in force in the country and can be seen in the courts for referral or in offices according to his cases and meeting the lawyer in the dream or seeing the same person as a lawyer in A dream is one of the dreams that raise controversy when we talk today about the most important interpretations that have arisen. Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream. Great interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, please follow us. Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream. Seeing a lawyer pleading in a dream means that at the end of the worries and problems of the viewer. A lawyer winning a case in a dream is good news for the patient’s recovery, the fulfillment of dreams, and victory over injustice. Seeing a lawyer in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to solve his problems and help those who stand by him so that he can overcome crises. Seeing a lawyer in a dream is also considered an indication of problems in the dreamer’s life or gossip and frequent talk about lies. Seeing the same person as a lawyer indicates his continuous efforts to achieve his goals and dreams. What if a person sees himself as a lawyer and loses a case? It is a sign of the virtue that will happen to him in one of the topics of his life that he seeks to achieve. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing a judge in a dream. Interpretation of a lawyer in a dream. A dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that he sees in a dream the same person as a lawyer, an indication of his need and request for support from those around him. Seeing a lawyer in a dream is an indication of the obstacles facing the fortuneteller. Seeing a shelter in a garrison in a dream indicates that the viewer seeks to solve the problems and crises he faces. Seeing a lawyer in a dream, see To the fortuneteller with anger: An indication of imminent losses that the viewer will suffer or make mistakes. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of divorce in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a lawyer in a girl’s dream defending her is an indication that she has close people who stand by her problems. Seeing a lawyer’s engagement indicates a woman An unmarried woman in her dream is a metaphor for committing wrong actions and one must be careful. If a girl sees that she is talking to a lawyer in a dream, it is an indication of her freedom from the problems and difficulties that she is already suffering from. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream for a married woman Vision A married woman wearing a lawyer’s uniform is an indication of her honesty and sincerity in her home. Meeting a lawyer at home for a married woman is an indication of getting rid of the problems and disputes that she suffers from in her home or between her husband. Seeing the appointment of a lawyer in a dream for a woman is good news for him to obtain something new, whether it is a house, a car, or anything else. Interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream for a pregnant woman. There are two interpretations, good and bad, for seeing a lawyer in a dream for a pregnant woman. The first is that it is an indication of ease of pregnancy and childbirth. The second is that seeing a lawyer for a pregnant woman can be a reference to the problems that she will face during pregnancy or childbirth. Seeing yourself talking to a lawyer in a dream about a woman Pointing out that it is easy to wear and that it will hold up any baby

title: Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream comes with a variety of interpretations, including good and bad. The details of the vision and the symbols accompanying it control the correct interpretation of the vision. Dreaming of raw chicken in a dream can be a symbol of a specific person, such as a beautiful woman with a light mind, and it can also be a symbol of an event, and dreaming of a live chicken in a dream can be related to eggs and their various interpretations. Most dream interpreters believe that the interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream is mainly dedicated to women. Once it may symbolize a virgin girl and once a married woman with children, and the color of the chicken in the dream controls the interpretation of its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Muhammad bin Sirin, the sheikh of the interpreter of dreams, believes that seeing a live chicken in a dream often symbolizes the woman in the dreamer's life. Imam Al-Nabulsi goes to the fact that the dreamer's benefit from the feathers of a live chicken in a dream is evidence of his benefit from money and good nutrition. Similarly, Ibn Sirin interprets eating chicken meat in a dream as a good vision for its owner, as he will be blessed with abundant money from a foreign source. Seeing a live chicken in a dream For a single woman, the interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream depends on its appearance in the dream, as well as on the dreamer’s action in it. The audience of dream interpreters say that a live chicken in a vision symbolizes a woman in the life of an unmarried girl. According to the description of this chicken is the interpretation. If the chicken appears in a dream in a humiliated or miserable state, this indicates a simple woman who serves the dreamer, such as nannies, maids, and those like them in this regard. If the chicken appears lying on her eggs, this indicates a woman with children, or an active and energetic woman who helps the fortuneteller in her life affairs. As for if a chicken appears in a dream accompanied by other birds, it is interpreted according to the bird with it. If the chicken appears in the company of a peacock, the dream indicates that the owner of the dream falls into sins and transgressions for which she must ask God for forgiveness. Some of the elders interpret the saying that a live chicken in a dream can refer to the girl who has the same dream. Therefore, some of what happens to the chicken in the dream goes to the girl herself, and then the vision can be good or it can be hatred. According to the interpretation, slaughtering a chicken in a dream is A sign of marriage. Imam Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi says: “Whoever slaughters a chicken will get married.” Interpretation of a dream about a live chicken for a pregnant woman The interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream for a pregnant woman is classified under the section of good and praiseworthy visions. A live chicken comes in a pregnant woman’s dream with many interpretations, all of which are positive and praiseworthy for the dreamer. To interpret the dream of a live chicken for a pregnant woman, it was said that the entry of a live chicken into a woman suffering from pain or illness is good news for her health and well-being and freedom from pain and problems. To this, Imam Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi went in interpreting the dream of introducing a live chicken to a patient, and he said in the interpretation of dreams. “And entering the patient’s health and well-being.” In the same context, Imam

title: Interpretation of a dream about intense crying for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of crying in a dream for a pregnant woman by Al-Nabulsi If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is crying bitterly and tearing her clothes. This is a sign that this woman is exposed to many problems during pregnancy and cannot bear this suffering. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is crying and hiding her crying. This is a sign that the due date is approaching and that the pregnancy problems will end soon. What if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is crying from her heart. This is a sign that he is suffering from psychological problems due to the approaching date of his birth. We have chosen for you: Crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a married woman crying in a dream A married woman sees herself in a dream crying loudly, but she suppresses the sound of crying. This will be a sign of following a wide diet and a change in circumstances for the better. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is crying bitterly and choking his crying, his tears are pouring down his face. This will be a sign of pregnancy soon, God willing. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is crying bitterly and her voice is loud in crying. This is a sign of many problems that she faces in her married life. It may be an indication of Almost divorced, but God will soon decide it for her, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. What if he saw in a dream that he was crying a lot at someone's funeral. This is a sign that he heard the news of the death of someone he knew. Interpretation of seeing intense crying in a dream of an unmarried girl by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen sees that if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream crying bitterly and suppressing her crying. This will be a sign that her affairs will improve and her problems will end, and evidence that she will be freed from her worries and problems. What if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crying bitterly and calling on God Almighty. This will be a sign of her future marriage, God willing. It may also indicate that there are some good changes in her life and God knows best. What if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is crying loudly and with intense burning. This will be a sign that he will hear of the death of someone he knows and will cry intensely, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If an unmarried girl sees herself crying in a dream because of the death of a family member. This is a sign of the loss of someone she loves, and God knows best. If the crying is suppressed, this is a sign of the comfort and happiness that she enjoys The deceased in the afterlife. You may be interested: Crying in a dream for a married woman, a single woman and a man by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing crying in a dream in general by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin believes that crying in a dream is a sign of trouble and sorrow and can mean happiness and joy. If a person sees in his dream that he is crying bitterly, but without making any sound, his crying is suppressed. This will be a sign that this person will get rid of the problems that stand in his way and disrupt his life, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If someone sees in a dream that he is crying with screaming and burning. This is a bad sign and evidence of some unpleasant events or evidence of a major problem or a serious mental illness. And whoever sees in a dream that he is crying when he hears the Holy Qur’an. This is a sign of his repentance

If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is crying bitterly and choking his crying, his tears are pouring down his face. This will be a sign of pregnancy soon, God willing. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is crying bitterly and her voice is loud in crying. This is a sign of many problems that she faces in her married life. It may be an indication of Almost divorced, but God will soon decide it for her, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. What if he saw in a dream that he was crying a lot at someone's funeral. This is a sign that he heard the news of the death of someone he knew. Interpretation of seeing intense crying in a dream of an unmarried girl by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen sees that if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream crying bitterly and suppressing her crying. This will be a sign that her affairs will improve and her problems will end, and evidence that she will be freed from her worries and problems. What if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crying bitterly and calling on God Almighty. This will be a sign of her future marriage, God willing. It may also indicate that there are some good changes in her life and God knows best. What if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is crying loudly and with intense burning. This will be a sign that he will hear of the death of someone he knows and will cry intensely, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If an unmarried girl sees herself crying in a dream because of the death of a family member. This is a sign of the loss of someone she loves, and God knows best. If the crying is suppressed, this is a sign of the comfort and happiness that she enjoys The deceased in the afterlife. You may be interested: Crying in a dream for a married woman, a single woman and a man by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing crying in a dream in general by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin believes that crying in a dream is a sign of trouble and sorrow and can mean happiness and joy. If a person sees in his dream that he is crying bitterly, but without making any sound, his crying is suppressed. This will be a sign that this person will get rid of the problems that stand in his way and disrupt his life, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If someone sees in a dream that he is crying with screaming and burning. This is a bad sign and evidence of some unpleasant events or evidence of a major problem or a serious mental illness. And whoever sees in a dream that he is crying when he hears the Holy Qur’an. This is a sign of his repentance

title: Learn about the interpretation of the name Ahmed in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the name Ahmed in a dream: It is one of the promising visions of many good things coming to God, but interpretations differ from one person to another, according to the gender and social status of the priest, and we will refer to the most important interpretations of this vision in the topic for us. Interpretation of the name Ahmed in a dream This vision indicates blessings. And the good news and happiness that will come to the dreamer in the coming period, which will change his life for the better. This vision also indicates the arrival and realization of something that the dreamer wanted to reach and waited a long time for it to actually happen, and that he will thank God very much for this matter. If the seeker sees the name Ahmed in a dream, this means that He has excelled in his studies and will reach the highest grades, and this vision shows the bright future of that student and that he will have knowledge and pass it on to others. Interpretation of the name Ahmed in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that this vision is one of the visions worthy of praise. As Ibn Sirin said, seeing the name Ahmed in The dreamer's dream shows the goodness that comes to the dreamer and that the dreamer has good qualities and is characterized by piety and a lot of praise in all the moments of his life and in his life. Skinny. Are you confused and can't find an explanation that reassures you? Search via Google on the site Secrets of Dream Interpretation. Interpretation of the name Ahmed in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees the name Ahmed in her dream, this means that the girl is highly praised and glorified by her Lord in all the situations of her life, whether in happy or sad situations. The vision also shows that she is always satisfied About God’s judgment, and the vision shows that the girl has good qualities such as honor, purity, and honesty. When an unmarried girl sees a young man named Ahmed in her dream, this indicates that she will soon marry a good young man and has the fear of God within her. Also, this young man seeks God’s satisfaction and obedience and helps her in Her life and helps her get closer to God and leads her to the right path. But if this girl has never married and never been engaged, then this is a sign that things will happen and good news will come to her that makes up for what went before. If an unmarried girl sees the name Ahmed in her dream, This indicates that she will be appointed to a new and prestigious job in the coming period or that she will succeed in her studies if she is a student and reaches the highest positions. If an unmarried girl sees the name Ahmed in her dream and in reality she is suffering from an illness, this is a sign of her recovery from her illness that caused her fatigue. And pain, and they will be healthy and praised. I thank God very much for healing from this disease. Interpretation of the name Ahmed in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees the name Ahmed in her dream, this is evidence of new events and situations that will change her life and change her psychological state from sadness to joy. But if a married woman sees a man named Ahmed in her dream This indicates her husband’s interest in her, his tenderness and kindness, and that he embraces her and is devoted to her. This vision also indicates that the married woman cares for her husband and takes care of him, because he is a husband who deserves her from her. title: Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a woman in a dream, one of the things a man feels most jealous of is his wife, and someone looks at her with lust because of her clothes or excessive makeup, so through this article we will present the largest number of cases related to seeing a window. – The wife’s clothing, as well as the sayings and opinions of major scholars and interpreters such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing a woman wearing a dream Seeing a wife in a dream carries many connotations and signs that can be identified from the following cases: If the husband sees in a dream that his veiled wife is revealing her face in front of a stranger, then this It symbolizes her shortcomings against her Lord and adherence to the teachings of His religion. The wife’s makeup in a way that shows her beauty in a man’s dream may indicate that he heard good news and the arrival of joys and happy occasions. Seeing the wife decorating herself in a dream and wearing sexy clothes for her husband indicates a lot of livelihood that must be earned and their transition to Living on a high social level. Seeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin touched upon the interpretation of seeing a beloved woman in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations attributed to him: Ibn Sirin interprets a husband who sees his wife being adorned in a dream, and appearing beautifully, as evidence of the stability of their marital life and that she She lives with him in prosperity and well-being. If the dreamer sees in his dream that his partner is doing more than what is allowed, this symbolizes the great problems and difficulties that he will face in his life, which will disturb his life. The beautification of his wife in a man’s dream is a sign of a major financial crisis that will lead to the accumulation of debts on him. Seeing a woman in a dream for a man: A wife wearing make-up and make-up to receive her husband in a dream is a sign of the stability of their marital life, their intense love, and an atmosphere of intimacy and affection in the family environment. A man who sees his wife being adorned in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money and abundant livelihood that he will receive in the period. Next.If the husband sees his wife wearing cosmetics and doing so to impress him in a dream, this symbolizes her intense love for him and her continuous effort to provide all the comforts and happiness for her family members. Seeing an obscene woman in a dreamIf a man sees his wife in a dream being obscene, this symbolizes the need to maintain Privacy between him and his life partner. The dreamer who sees that his wife appears in a dream wearing immodest clothes in a dream indicates the presence of people who are not good and hate them, who want to harm them and separate them, and he must resort to this vision and pay attention. And the attention of those around him. Seeing an immodest wife who wears revealing clothes in a dream without being ashamed of people shows the difficulty of achieving one’s goals and desires despite his serious efforts. A husband who sees his wife obscene in a dream while she is in a bad condition, indicates the misfortunes that will befall him from the arrangement of evil people. Those around him must be careful and vigilant. Seeing a woman adorn herself in front of strangers in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman wearing the hijab in front of strangers in a dream? Will it be good or bad for the dreamer? We will respond to this in the following cases: If a man sees that his wife is adorning herself and wearing a dress

title: Engagement of a married woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the engagement of a married woman in a dream: It is certain that the dream of the engagement of a married woman in a dream has many connotations that may differ according to the diversity of the person who sees this dream. Also, this dream differs from one person to another according to his situation and the circumstances in which he lives. If a person dreams that he is watching someone preaching. This indicates that this person wants to change his life for the better. It is also possible that this dream indicates that good will come to this dreamer in the very near future. But if one sees that he is engaged to a very beautiful girl in his dream. This indicates that this girl is really very beautiful But if the dreamer is married and sees that he is engaged to an unmarried girl. This indicates that something good awaits this man for a long time. Likewise, if one sees that he is engaged to a girl and that this girl is from a rich and valuable family. This dream indicates that this man will become Addicted to drinking alcohol. A married woman can dream in her dream that she may be engaged to someone other than her husband. This vision makes this married woman anxious, sad, and surprised. This is because neither of the women wants to get married or that Tim is engaged to someone other than her husband. It may Be interested: Interpretation of a dream about engagement by someone I do not know for single peopleInterpretation of a dream about a married woman’s engagement in a dream by Ibn SirinIf a married woman dreams that she may be engaged to someone she does not know. According to the interpretation of the great scholar and translator Ibn Sirin, he says that this symbolizes the abundant good that will come on this occasion. A married woman. It also indicates that this woman’s husband loves her very much in reality. It also indicates that there is a lot of goodness that a married woman will receive. This kindness could be money or kindness in matters of this woman’s marriage, and this happens if problems occur between her and Her husband. It is also possible that the interpretation of this dream refers to the blessing that will fall on this married woman in her life. It can also symbolize the happiness and comfort that the married woman feels in her marriage to her husband. This dream also indicates that the family of this married woman loves her Often. But if this married woman has daughters of engagement and marriage age. This dream indicates that if this woman’s daughter is engaged, then her husband’s date is approaching. In general, if a married woman dreams that she is engaged in her dream. This indicates kindness, joy, and things The good that will happen to her and her family. If a married woman dreams that she vomits on the day of her engagement in a dream. This is evidence that there is an evil eye or magic that could befall this woman, so she should be careful. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about my unmarried brother’s engagement. Harmful to a married woman’s engagement in A dream: If a married woman dreams that she wants to get engaged to her father. This indicates that her father does not take care of her, and it also shows that her father treats her as a bad worker. In addition, it shows alienation, and that the married woman is far from her father, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if A married woman dreamed that she had broken off her engagement with her fiancé
